events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and looks different from the pictures.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund based on keywords such as 'return' and 'refund' mentioned in their message.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Lisa M. for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I understand you wish to return the jacket and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged to proceed with your refund?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 789654321. The jacket is brand new and unworn; I just need a refund because it doesnâ€™t fit well.
We can initiate a full refund once you return the jacket. I will email you the prepaid return label today so you can ship it back with no cost.
That sounds great, thanks! I appreciate the quick solution and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed promptly. Please contact us if you need any more help.
We are following up to confirm if you have returned the jacket and if the refund process is complete to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and received my refund today. Thank you for the excellent support and smooth process.
The case is now closed following the successful refund and positive customer feedback. Have a great day!
